My parents are supportive of my career as a translator.
I'm from the Midwest, where we drive big trucks and have big hands.
I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.

participant_2.background:
I think my pets are the best things in my life.

i love to surf.
I've spent way too much money on gummy worms.

content.text: It's nice to meet you! I'm from the Midwest, where we drive big trucks and have big hands.
Hi! Nice to meet you too! I think my pets are the best things in my life.
I love animals too! I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
Aww, I'm sorry you had to give up your dogs. I love dogs! Do you know what breed you're going to get?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about a golden retriever or a labrador retriever.
Those are both great breeds! I had a golden retriever when I was growing up. He was the best dog ever.
That's great to hear! I'm sure your golden retriever was amazing.
He was! He was always so happy and friendly. He loved to play fetch and go for walks.
That sounds like a great dog. I'm sure I'll love my new puppy.
I'm sure you will! I'm excited for you to get one!
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to make my own Christmas cards. I also like to swim, hike, and spend time with my family.
That's awesome! I love to swim and hike too. I also like to surf.
I've never been surfing! I've always wanted to try it.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to give suggestions.
